This pull does not merge cleanly onto current master
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is mo

NACK.

First: Berkeley DB doesn't give any guarantees that removing a key/value pair will actually remove it from either the .dat file, the journal file(s), or the hard disk. I don't want to repeat the wallet encryption fiasco we went through, where private keys remained on disk unexpectedly.

Second: I believe the tentative plan for a future wallet format is an append-only format, because app
